author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-4760: Spring DSL. Improved error handler XML namespace parser to only accept logName and level options for the logging error handler.

author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-3946 - Had a bit of a change of heart about this one. I'm concerned that putting extra doPrivileged checks in the main message flow is going to have a negative impact on performance so I've swapped out that code so a check on the presence of a message header.

author: ihabunek
msg: Updated plugins in POM to latest stable versions. Removed redundant declaration of the Rat plugin.
